code: import*as yup from'yup';export var productValidationSchema=yup.object({name:yup.string().required(),brand:yup.string().required(),type:yup.string().required(),price:yup.number().required().moreThan(100),quantityInStock:yup.number().required().min(0),description:yup.string().required(),file:yup.mixed().when('pictureUrl',{is:function is(value){return!value;},then:yup.mixed().required('Please upload an image')})});
